title: Kasa.
description: For this project, I developed the front end of a housing rental site using React. I was responsible for transforming a static mockup into a dynamic and fully functional website. This included creating reusable React components, managing application state, and ensuring the user interface was both responsive and intuitive.

title: Voyage à la carte.
description: Creation of a presentation website for a photography project. The goal was to showcase the photographer's portfolio in an elegant and user-friendly manner, ensuring that the website was visually appealing and easy to navigate.

title: Mon vieux grimoire.
description: In this project, I focused on backend development for Mon Vieux grimoire website. My responsibilities included building the server using Node.js and Express, and implementing a MongoDB database to manage and store data efficiently. This project enhanced my skills in server-side programming and database management.

title: Nina Carducci.
description: I worked on debugging and improving the Nina Carducci website using Chrome DevTools. The main tasks involved identifying and fixing various bugs, optimizing the site’s performance, and enhancing the overall user experience by updating the HTML and CSS.
